name: Stone-Handed

benefit: Before making a melee attack with an unarmed strike, you can expend one use of Stunning Fist to declare a stone-handed strike. Resolve the attack normally, except your attack ignores an amount of the targetâ€™s hardness equal to your monk level or one-quarter your base attack bonus (minimum 1), whichever is higher.
